subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Argentine Superstar Lionel Messi will not be joining Barcelona for its two-game United States tour after FIFA told clubs Wednesday that they must release players aged 23 and under to play in the Olympics.
snippet: Argentine Superstar Lionel Messi will not be joining Barcelona for its two-game United States tour after FIFA told clubs Wednesday that they must release players aged 23 and under to play in the Olympics.
